BOT_MODE_OFF: Now a bot will not play for you!
STATIC_BACKGROUND_ON: Some game menus will now use a default background!
STATIC_BACKGROUND_OFF: Some game menus will now use the background from the main menu!
AI_ON: Now the bots will show signs of life!
AI_OFF: Now the bots will not show signs of life!
